text: Research how to build an agent that can work on research, writing & coding tasks while the user is asleep, focusing on quality over speed.

steps.text: Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) for each task type (research, writing, coding) to measure quality
Explore relevant AI architectures and algorithms that can handle complex tasks with high precision, such as sequence-to-sequence models or multimodal models
Research data formats and APIs required to process research articles, writing prompts, and coding projects
